Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition HPA-Model

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
HPA-Model 0..*Base成人預防保健(HPA)之資料模型
caseNo 1..1Identifier就醫序號
patientInformation 1..1BackboneElement受檢民眾基本資料
idCardNumber 1..1Identifier身分證字號
medicalRecordid 0..1Identifier病歷號碼
name 1..1HumanName姓名
gender 1..1code性別
birthDate 1..1dateTime出生日期
telecom 1..1ContactPoint電話
city 1..1string戶籍地
organization 1..1BackboneElement醫事機構
identifier 1..1Identifier醫事機構代碼
examOrganization 1..1BackboneElement委託代檢醫事檢驗機構
identifier 1..1Identifier委託代檢醫事檢驗機構代號
practitioner 1..2BackboneElement服務診治醫師
firstStagePractitioner 1..1dateTime第一階段服務診治醫師代號
secondStagePractitioner 0..1dateTime第二階段服務診治醫師代號
firstStageDate 1..1dateTime第一階段檢查日期
secondStageDate 0..1dateTime第二階段檢查日期
checkResultUploadDate 0..1dateTime檢查結果上傳日期
medicalHistory 0..1BackboneElement疾病史
hypertension 0..1CodeableConcept高血壓
diabetes 0..1CodeableConcept糖尿病
hyperlipidemia 0..1CodeableConcept高血脂症
cvd 0..1CodeableConcept心臟病
stroke 0..1CodeableConcept腦中風
kidneyDisease 0..1CodeableConcept腎臟病
lifestyleHistory 0..1BackboneElement生活史
cigarette 0..1string吸菸
alcoholicDrink 0..1string喝酒
nuts 0..1string嚼檳榔
exercise 0..1string運動
hepatitisBC 0..1string檢查過B、C型肝炎
depressionScreening 0..1BackboneElement憂鬱檢測
feelingdepressed 0..1string憂鬱檢測：感覺情緒低落沮喪
loseinterest 0..1string憂鬱檢測：做事情失去興趣
vitalSign 0..6BackboneElement生理量測數值
height 0..1Quantity身高
weight 0..1Quantity體重
sbp 0..1Quantity血壓 -- 收縮壓
dbp 0..1Quantity血壓 -- 舒張壓
waistline 0..1Quantity腰圍
bmi 0..1QuantityBMI
labTestValue 13..13BackboneElement檢驗檢查數值
urineProtein 1..1QuantityProtein 尿蛋白
glucose 1..1Quantity血糖
cholesterol 1..1Quantity膽固醇
triglyceride 1..1Quantity三酸甘油脂
ldl 1..1Quantity低密度脂蛋白膽固醇計算
hdl 1..1Quantity高密度膽固醇
got 1..1QuantityＧＯＴ
gpt 1..1QuantityＧＰＴ
creatinine 1..1Quantity肌酸酐
egfr 1..1Quantity腎絲球過濾率計算
hbsag 1..1QuantityＢ型肝炎表面抗原
antiHCV 1..1QuantityＣ型肝炎病毒抗體
uricAcid 1..1Quantity尿酸
healthConsultation 0..10BackboneElement健康諮詢
smoking 0..1string健康諮詢：戒煙
alcoholic 0..1string健康諮詢：節酒
nuts 0..1string健康諮詢：戒檳榔
exercise 0..1string健康諮詢：規律運動
weight 0..1string健康諮詢：維持正常體重
food 0..1string健康諮詢：健康飲食
accident 0..1string健康諮詢：事故傷害預防
oral 0..1string健康諮詢：口腔保健
kidney 0..1string健康諮詢：腎病識能衛教指導
chronic 0..1string健康諮詢：慢性疾病風險評估
kidneyStage 0..1string腎功能檢查期別
testResultsAndRecommendations 0..9BackboneElement檢查結果與建議
bloodPressure 0..1string血壓檢查結果與建議
bloodGlucose 0..1string血糖檢查結果判讀
bloodLipids 0..1string血脂肪檢查結果判讀
kidneyFunction 0..1string腎功能檢查結果判讀
liverFunction 0..1string肝功能檢查結果判讀
metabolicSyndrome 0..1string代謝症候群檢查結果與建議
hepatitisB 0..1stringB型肝炎檢查結果與建議
hepatitisC 0..1stringC型肝炎檢查結果與建議
depression 0..1string憂鬱檢測結果與建議
riskAssessment 0..5BackboneElement慢性病疾病風險
acs 0..1BackboneElement慢性疾病風險值:冠心病
diabetes 0..1BackboneElement慢性疾病風險值:糖尿病
hypertension 0..1BackboneElement慢性疾病風險值:高血壓
stroke 0..1BackboneElement慢性疾病風險值:腦中風
mace 0..1BackboneElement慢性疾病風險值:心血管不良事件

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.definition: May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.
element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.short: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
element.definition:
May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element and that modifies the understanding of the element in which it is contained and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself).
element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone.
element.requirements: Modifier extensions allow for extensions that *cannot* be safely ignored to be clearly distinguished from the vast majority of extensions which can be safely ignored.  This promotes interoperability by eliminating the need for implementers to prohibit the presence of extensions. For further information, see the [definition of modifier extensions](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extensibility.html#modifierExtension).

May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element and that modifies the understanding of the element in which it is contained and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself).
element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone.
element.requirements: Modifier extensions allow for extensions that *cannot* be safely ignored to be clearly distinguished from the vast majority of extensions which can be safely ignored.  This promotes interoperability by eliminating the need for implementers to prohibit the presence of extensions. For further information, see the [definition of modifier extensions](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extensibility.html#modifierExtension).
